title: God or Demon!? The Strongest Man Appeared in Hell
description: Kenshiro finally confronts his old nemesis, Shin. But he is shocked to hear that Yuria has already committed suicide and left this world.

title: The Zankei Death Blow!! Lights Appeared at the End!!
Punches Are Burning on a Dark Street! Five Fingered Explosive Burst!!
Attack Bloody Cross!! The Secret Punch by Soft Strikes
description: Kenshiro has killed Shin's subordinates. Shin orders Heart to exterminate Kenshiro.

title: The Flame of Love in Hell. You're Already Dead!!
The evil's plan. Attacking the man with 4 scars!
Villains! Countdown to death
Rip into the Nerve Cells! No Requiem for the Bad Guys
Criminals! Pray before you die!!
Flame death blow! Too many people should die!!
description: Pastora and Dragon are controlling the lake's water and afflict the village people.

title: Villains!! Listen to the requiem from Hell!!
description: Kenshiro returns water to the well, as Toyo who is Bat's foster parent, wishes.

title: I am the God of Death!! I'll chase you to the ends of Hell!!
description: In order to avenge Toyo, who dies protecting the children of the village, Kenshiro chases Jackal while defeating members of the Warriors one after another.

title: The arhat deva fist! The endless killing!!
These grieving times! Many kind people die too early!!
I count to three! You are the one who is dead!!
Try to Sing, Villains! The Counting Rhyme of Hell!!
Fight if you are a man! The guts of Confrontation Have Opened!
Life or Death!? At the End of the Wilderness Lies the First Street of Hell!
description: The fully assembled King Army assaults a village Ken was visiting.

title: Damn! Get Ready to Die!!
Nightmarish Full-Scale War! My Fists Pack One Million Volts!
The Palace Is on Fire! Shin! I'm Close to Finding You!!
Julia Forever... As Well as Shin!
Stormy Times. Titanic Battles! Is Battle All That Awaits Me?!
Nanto Suichoken! The Tragedy of the Mighty Begins!
Sinners! Thy Name Is Fang!
description: Mamiya's brother Kou is attacked by the Fang Clan and publicly executed. A strawberry for Mamiya's birthday cake is found on his remains.

title: Tremble & Die! Villains of Night Fog Valley!
description: Kenshiro and Rei, North Star and South Star, set out to exterminate the Fang Clan.

title: Only Villains Can Smile! How I Hate This Age!
Rei, I'll Wipe Your Tears Away with My Fists!
It's Too Late to Beg for Mercy! To Hell with You, Boss Fang!
description: Kenshiro tells Rei about the seven scars on his chest, and Rei believes him.

title: Destiny Looms Near! Who Are You, Jagi?!
description: One man has been calling himself Kenshiro and perpetuating acts of cruelty.

title: The Iron Mask of Hell! The Fiend Who Calls Himself North Star!
description: The feeble Mako and his younger brother Aki live in a town under Jagi's control.

title: Four Linked Punches of Fury! Wait for Me in Hell, Jagi!
description: Jagi chooses the roof of a 200 meter-tall building for the site of his showdown.

title: This Is a Miracle Village! The Fallen Angel!!
Toki! Are You Angel or Devil?!
Evil One! Toki, Your Heart Has Been Corrupted!!
description: Yu, part of the caravan that picked Lin up, has fallen ill.

title: There Is No Looking Back! Only Hating Evil, and Striking Toki Down!
Instead, I Shall Reject Love! For I Bear the Cursed Star of Death!
Crimson Fist of Lotus Mountain! A Tragic Woman Born of the Times!
A Wicked Legacy! The Gates to Cassandra Open Now!
Villains Need No Graves! This Is the Hellish Cassandra!
description: Cassandra's gate opens.

title: The North Star's 2,000-Year Tragedy! I Can Hear the Fist King's Footsteps!
description: While Kenshiro and Mamiya fight in Cassandra, Lin and Bat hold onto hope and wait for news of their victory.

title: A Century's End with No Tomorrow! I've Been Waiting for You, Ken!
description: Kenshiro's group heads into prison to reunite with Toki, but Ken-oh's Royal Guard stands in their way.

title: Cassandra Collapses! The North Star's Mythology Is Painted Anew!
The Death Omen Star Shines! Fist King, Do You Control Even Death?!
description: Kenshiro and the others leave Cassanra behind for the town where Lin, Bat and Airi are waiting.

title: Those Who Fear the Reaper! Listen to the Voice of Lin's Fiery Heart!
description: Ken-oh's Assault Squadron attacks the village where Lin and the others wait.

title: Voices from Hell! Rei, Did You See the Death Omen Star?
description: Lin's bravery in the face of certain death inspires courage within the villagers, who mount a resistance against the assault squadron.

title: The Nanto Dance of Death! I'll Give My Life for the Sake of Love!
description: Rei challenges Raoh, but Raoh's fighting spirit alone overwhelms him. Raoh defeats Rei with a single finger, without ever dismounting from his steed, Kokuoh.

title: An Explosion of Secret Techniques! Beyond Hatred Is the Fate for the Brothers of the North Star
description: Rei tries desperately to stop Kenshiro from challenging Raoh.

title: The Greatest Battle in History, Raoh vs Ken! You're the One to Die!
description: Mamiya tries to save Toki by firing a bowgun at Raoh, but the Two-Finger Vacuum Grasp sends the arrow back at her.

title: 72 Hours to Live! The Death Omen Star Drags Rei In!
description: Kenshiro and Raoh's fight comes to a close, but Rei has three days left to live.

title: Fate Without Tomorrow! And Yet, a Woman Believes in Love!
description: Kenshiro and Rei arrive at Medicine City to rescue Mamiya, who was captured by Galf.

title: Yuda of the South Star Six Sacred Fists! I'm the Most Beautiful!!
description: The man who carved the initials UD into Mamiya's shoulder was Yuda, the traitorous bearer of the Star of Enchantment and one of the 108 styles of the South Star Sacred Fist.

title: Death Omen Star Is Falling! Rei! Heaven Tricks Time Cruelly!
Beloved Mamiya! The Death Omen Star Lurks Behind the Sparkle in Your Eyes!
description: Rei has only a short time left to live.

title: Rei, Are You on Your Way to Death? A Man Is Beautiful Than Ever!
description: Dedicating the tiny remainder of his life to Mamiya, Rei seeks Yuda's defeat.

title: Beautiful Warriors, Rei vs Yuda! A Man's Passage Needs No Tears!
description: Rei is saved from peril by Kenshiro's fist, and Yuda's eyes are dazzled by the beauty of Rei's techniques.

title: Farewell, Rei! Heroic Legend Will Be Told Throughout the Ages!
description: Rei locks himself in a house alone to await his final moments, not wanting his miserable death to be seen by others.

title: Supreme Rule in Turbulence! As the South Star Fades, the North Star Appears!
description: After seeing Rei through his final moments, Kenshiro begins his journey once again.

title: The Star of Darkness Engulfs the Heavens! Time Evolves Beyond the Deathmatch!
description: Shu is a blind man who wields one of the South Star Six Sacred Fists.

title: Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! What Will You Witness in the End of This Century!?
description: Souther's forces abduct children and conscript them for the construction of his Holy Cross Mausoleum.

title: Love on the Battlefield! Must the Time Tear Love Apart!?
description: The Holy Emperor's forces' Garzus Squadron, attacks a young resistance member named Jay, and then the village where his fianc?e is hidden.

title: I am Souther, the Holy Emperor! I Disallow Love and Compassion!
description: Kenshiro hits secret pressure points on Peji and Giji, wielders of the South Star Twin Cutting Swords, then finally faces Souther.

title: A Young Hero Challenges His Fate! Scream from Your Soul Shall Move the Heavens!
description: Even after hitting the deadly secret pressure point, the "jinchukyoku," Kenshiro cannot hold his ground against Souther's overwhelming might.

title: A Bloody Battle, Shu vs Souther! Love, Drowned in the Tears of the Star of Benevolence!
description: Upon hearing from Kenshiro that Shiba died to save him, Shu is stricken with both grief and pride for his son.

title: The Bloody Cross Mausoleum! Shu! I'll Catch Your Tears with My Heart!
description: The Holy Emperor's forces' Garzus Squadron, attacks a young resistance member named Jay, and then the village where his fianc?e is hidden.

title: Run Kenshiro! Another Comrade is About to Die!!
description: Kenshiro reaches the Holy Cross Mausoleum.

title: Clash of the Polar Stars, Ken vs. Souther! My Star Is the Only Protector of Heaven!
description: Kenshiro and Souther face off.

title: Souther, the Despondent Holy Emperor! You Are Weary from Love!
description: Souther puts his pride as Holy Emperor on the line with his undefeated technique, the Heaven Soaring Cross Phoenix.

title: Critical Times of the North Star! The Three Brothers of Fate Are on the Move
description: Raoh's fighting spiritual energy surges, and a steely gleam returns to his eyes.

title: The Other Divine Fist of the North Star! Drive Raoh to Oblivion!!
description: To gauge his own injuries, Raoh chooses Koryu as his opponent.

title: The Secret of Origin Revealed! The Heaven Prefers Tragedy!
description: Toki and Raoh battle in past and present.

title: Farewell, Toki! A Man Only Cries Once!
description: The curtain of destiny draws to a close over Toki and Raoh. Raoh's Battle Strength Summons gathers all of Toki's fighting power into Toki's fists.

title: Ryuga of Sirius! I'll Seize the Rainbow in Tempest!
description: A village once ruled by Ken-oh is now ruled by brigands.

title: A Wolf Running in the Horizon! There Lies the End of Love and Hatred!
description: Sirius, a lone star associated with neither the South Star nor the North Star.

title: Forgive Me, My Sister! I Am Destined to Clash with the North Star!
description: Kenshiro visits a town dominated by the Sabat gang, and strikes the gluttonous Sabat down by hitting a secret pressure point.

title: An Iron Fist for the Roaring Wolf! Toki Is in Danger!
description: Kenshiro arrives in a village under Ryuga's control, and Garoh draws his blade upon him.

title: Conclusion of Part Three: Let the New Age Awaken! The Wolf's Howl Moves the Heaven!
description: After Ryuga abducts Toki, Kenshiro pursues Ryuga to his castle.

title: Shin of the South Star Sacred Fist! Risked Your Life for Love That Never Will!
description: The man who marked the beginning of Kenshiro's fateful journey.

title: Rei of the South Star Waterfowl Fist! Was a Man Who Died for His Friends!!
description: Rei, a man of the South Star Waterfowl Fist, an elegant and beautiful art with unparalleled brutality.

title: Yuda of the South Star Crimson Crane Fist! His Beautiful Smile Calls for Tragedy!
description: Yuda, of the Star of Deception and its crimson gleam, deemed himself the most beautiful in the world.

title: Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! The Heaven Only Bestows Cruel Destinies
description: When Kenshiro was a boy, Shu of the South Star Waterfowl Fist, gave up his own light in exchange for Kenshiro's life.

title: Holy Emperor Souther! Your Deep Affection Consumes You in Love!
description: Yuda caused the destruction of the South Star Sacred Fist.

title: Raoh Must Die! The Legend Turns to Terror!
description: Ken-Oh steadily sends his troops forward, expanding his territory.

title: The South Star Strikes Back! The Wind Brigade Protects the Last General of the South Star!
description: Kenshiro fights the Killer Machine Gren, created by Dabide, one of Ken-Oh's followers.

title: Prelude to a Death Match! The Screams of Hyui of the Wind Echoes in the Heaven!
description: The Wind Brigade destroys Ken-Oh's forces in several locations to draw Ken-Oh out.

title: The Burning Crimson Brigade! Shuren Is Drenched in Tears of Flame!
description: Morgan, the chief of the vanguard forces for Ken-Oh, values cars more than human lives.

title: Five Chariot Stars in Danger! Raoh Has Finally Pierced Through the Flames!
description: Shuren's unit faces Ken-Oh's forces.

title: The Five Chariot Stars Approach Kenshiro! Who Are You, Fudo?!
description: The mysterious Fudo tails Kenshiro and the others.

title: The Crisis Is Near! Ken, Destiny Awaits at the Capital of the South Star!
description: Kenshiro finds a group of bandits using Ken-Oh's name, and finishes them off with the Cross Neck Face Breaker and the Mountain Fissuring Wave.

title: I Am Juza of the Clouds! I Shall Move with the Flow of Time!
description: Ken-Oh's pike brigade appears before Kenshiro, and he strikes a pressure point on their commander, Yakob.

title: The Clouds Remain! The Masked General Is Finally Revealed!
description: Kenshiro and the others are taken to a village run by Dolfi, an agent of Ken-Oh.

title: Juza of the Clouds Resurrects! I Have No Fear for Raoh!!
description: While Kenshiro comes to a bridge checkpoint and finishes off Balda's squad with the "North Star Toric Murderous Kick Attack!", Raoh continues to advance his main troops forward.

title: Juza vs Raoh! An End of the Legend of the Invincible!!
description: Kenshiro and the others set out for the South Star capital, but Ken-Oh's Assassin Squad appear before them. Kenshiro dodges Jenimo's two-sword style and gives him a pounding!

title: Fudo in Peril! Hurry, Ken. A Man Must Not Abandon His Friends!
description: With Kokuoh gone and his mobility cut off, Raoh sends Zaku's squad at Kenshiro to try to stop him as well.

title: Treacherous Quicksand! Will the Hand of Salvation Reach Fudo?
description: Fudo dives into a bottomless quicksand pit to save his children.

title: Juza Falls! I'll Give My Life to Protect the Woman I Love
description: For the last South Star general, Juza fights Ken-Oh again, and risks receiving the first strike.

title: Farewell Yuria! A Strong Man Will Not Speak of Love, Even in Death!
description: Having learned who the last general is, Kenshiro dispatches one of Ken-Oh's squads.

title: The Capital of the South Star Trembles! The Two Brothers of the North Star Finally Arrive!
description: Raoh destroyed the Divine Fist of the North Star's 2,000 years of history.

title: Sadness of the Five Chariot Stars! Love and Destiny Looms Over the Woman!
description: The last South Star general, who holds the key to conquering the century's end, is Yuria.

title: The Ultimate Secret Technique, Unconscious Transmigration! Raoh, I've Got You Now!
description: Kenshiro believes that Yuria will die unless he defeats Raoh, and is in a race to defeat him before reuniting with her.

title: Is It the End of Raoh and His Ambitions? The Heaven Hesitates Once Again!
description: Raoh's legs buckle with fear under Kenshiro's Divine Fist of the North Star Ultimate Secret Technique, the "Unconscious Transmigration".

title: Raoh, the Confused Giant! I Don't Believe in Love!!
description: Kenshiro, with his eyes wounded and his light stolen, sets out into the wasteland after Ken-Oh.

title: A Challenge from the Devil! Fudo, Be the Demon for Those You Love!
description: Fudo was once called a demon, and in his youth Raoh feared him.

title: Fudo, the Gentle Warrior! His Tears Awaken a Fiery Soul!
description: Raoh and Fudo fight furiously, but the battle ends with Raoh at the advantage.

title: Protect the Merciful Mother of the South Star! Even If It's the End of the Five Chariots!
description: The Five Chariot Stars fall before Raoh, trying to protect the South Star Merciful Mother, Yuria. Rihaku, the last of the Five Chariot Stars, sees Hyui, Shuren, Juza and Fudo within the funeral pyre. Kenshiro swears not to let their souls pass on in vain.

title: Raoh, Shaken by a Nightmare! Yuria, You Are the Only One!!
description: News of Ken-Oh's defeat causes upheaval in his troops, and before long his plans begin to crumble from the ground up.

title: Showdown at the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground! No One Can Stop Them Now!
description: Kenshiro and Raoh face off at the most holy of training grounds in the 2,000 year history of the North Star, The North Star Mind and Body Training Ground. Kenshiro possesses the Unconscious Transmigration, which only those who bear sadness can learn.

title: Farewell, the Brothers of the North Star! They're Beyond Love and Sorrow!
description: Raoh unleashes a fierce fighting spirit. Enveloped within it, Kenshiro tells Raoh that each of their next blows will both be their last.

title: Now Revealed! The 2000 Year History of the North Star!
description: Kenshiro and Yuria first met at The North Star Mind and Body Training Ground.
